title: Levitating (feat. DaBaby)
author: Dua Lipa
lyrics:
[00:00.37] BILLBOARD BABY, Dua Lipa make 'em dance when it come on
[00:03.25] E'rybody lookin' for a dance floor to run on
[00:05.54] If you wanna run away with me, I know a galaxy
[00:07.61] And I can take you for a ride
[00:09.95] I had a premonition that we fell into a rhythm
[00:12.10] Where the music don't stop for life
[00:14.88] Glitter in the sky, glitter in my eyes
[00:17.06] Shining just the way I like
[00:19.38] If you're feeling like you need a little bit of company
[00:21.54] You met me at the perfect time
[00:24.68] You want me, I want you, baby
[00:26.82] My sugarboo, I'm levitating
[00:29.25] The Milky Way, we're renegading
[00:31.16] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[00:32.91] I got you, moonlight, you're my starlight
[00:37.76] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[00:42.05] I'm levitating
[00:42.73] You, moonlight, you're my starlight (you're the moonlight)
[00:47.08] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[00:51.34] I'm levitating
[00:52.69] I'm one of the greatest, ain't no debatin' on it (let's go)
[00:54.72] I'm still levitatin', I'm heavily medicated
[00:56.84] Ironic, I gave 'em love, and they end up hatin' on me (cold)
[00:59.38] She told me she love me, and she'd been waitin'
[01:01.25] Been fightin' hard for your love, and I'm runnin' thin on my patience
[01:03.63] Needed someone to hug, even took it back to the basics
[01:05.93] You see what you got me out here doin'? (Yeah)
[01:07.58] Might've threw me off, but can't nobody stop the movement, uh-uh
[01:10.35] Let's go, left foot, right foot, levitatin' (c'mon)
[01:13.05] Pop stars (oh), Dua Lipa with DaBaby
[01:15.17] I had to lace my shoes for all the blessings I was chasin' (go)
[01:17.52] If I ever slip, I'll fall into a better situation
[01:19.61] So catch up, go put some cheese on it
[01:21.72] Get out and get your bread up (yeah, yeah)
[01:23.14] They always leave when you fall, but you run together (hey)
[01:25.56] Weight of the world on my shoulders, I kept my head up
[01:27.82] Now, baby, stand up, 'cause girl, you
[01:29.72] You want me (hey), I want you, baby (hey)
[01:32.13] My sugarboo, I'm levitating
[01:34.41] The Milky Way, we're renegading
[01:36.37] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[01:38.22] I got you, moonlight, you're my starlight
[01:42.93] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[01:47.33] I'm levitating
[01:48.08] You, moonlight, you're my starlight (you're the moonlight)
[01:52.15] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[01:56.59] I'm levitating (woo)
[01:57.94] You can fly away with me tonight
[02:00.19] You can fly away with me tonight
[02:02.47] Baby, let me take you for a ride
[02:04.28] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[02:05.98] I'm levitating (woo)
[02:07.20] You can fly away with me tonight
[02:09.43] You can fly away with me tonight
[02:11.87] Baby, let me take you for a ride
[02:13.56] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (woo)
[02:15.87] My love is like a rocket, watch it blast off
[02:17.92] And I'm feeling so electric, dance my arse off
[02:20.65] And even if I wanted to, I can't stop
[02:22.82] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[02:25.18] My love is like a rocket, watch it blast off
[02:27.31] And I'm feeling so electric, dance my arse off
[02:29.75] And even if I wanted to, I can't stop
[02:32.29] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[02:35.13] You want me, I want you, baby
[02:37.49] My sugarboo, I'm levitating
[02:39.75] The Milky Way, we're renegading
[02:43.46] I got you (yeah), moonlight, you're my starlight
[02:48.11] I need you all night (all night), come on, dance with me (let's go)
[02:52.58] I'm levitating (woo)
[02:53.77] You can fly away with me tonight (tonight)
[02:56.19] You can fly away with me tonight
[02:58.41] Baby, let me take you for a ride
[03:00.20] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (take you for a ride)
[03:01.82] I'm levitating (woo)
[03:03.09] You can fly away with me tonight (tonight)
[03:05.36] You can fly away with me tonight
[03:07.72] Baby, let me take you for a ride
[03:09.43] Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (let me take you for a ride)
[03:11.55] I got you, moonlight, you're my starlight (starlight)
[03:16.10] I need you all night, come on, dance with me
[03:20.41] I'm levitating
[03:21.04]
